languages.text: "Для префекта Вультур и маршала Стракса за попытку исказить Лекс Империалис приговор — смерть. Остальные должны предстать пред вашим судом сообразно закону Императора".
"For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."
languages.original_text: "Для префекта Вультур и маршала Стракса за попытку исказить Лекс Империалис приговор — смерть. Остальные должны предстать пред вашим судом сообразно закону Императора".

traits.locale_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgment in accordance with the Emperor's law."
"For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgment in accordance with the Emperor's law."
"For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgment in accordance with the Emperor's law."
"For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."
"For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

languages.text: "Präfektin Vultur und Marschall Strachs werden für ihren Versuch, das Lex Imperia zu pervertieren zum Tode verurteilt. Alle anderen werden gemäß der Gesetze des Imperators vor Gericht gestellt."
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Präfektin Vultur und Marschall Strachs werden für ihren Versuch, das Lex Imperia zu pervertieren zum Tode verurteilt. Alle anderen werden gemäß der Gesetze des Imperators vor Gericht gestellt."

languages.text: « La préfète Vultur et le maréchal Strachs méritent d'être condamnés à mort pour avoir tenté de pervertir la Lex Imperialis. Les autres subiront votre jugement conformément à la loi de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: « La préfète Vultur et le maréchal Strachs méritent d'être condamnés à mort pour avoir tenté de pervertir la Lex Imperialis. Les autres subiront votre jugement conformément à la loi de l'Empereur. »
« La préfète Vultur et le maréchal Strachs méritent d'être condamnés à mort pour avoir tenté de pervertir la Lex Imperialis. Les autres subiront votre jugement conformément à la loi de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: “沃尔图尔行政官与斯塔克斯元帅企图歪曲帝国法典，必须判处死刑。其他人需要按照帝皇的律法，接受你的审判。”
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: “沃尔图尔行政官与斯塔克斯元帅企图歪曲帝国法典，必须判处死刑。其他人需要按照帝皇的律法，接受你的审判。”

languages.text: «En el caso de la prefecta Vultur y el Mariscal Strachs, la sentencia por intentar pervertir la Lex Imperialis es la muerte. Los demás deberán enfrentarse a tu juicio de acuerdo con la ley del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: «En el caso de la prefecta Vultur y el Mariscal Strachs, la sentencia por intentar pervertir la Lex Imperialis es la muerte. Los demás deberán enfrentarse a tu juicio de acuerdo con la ley del Emperador».

languages.text: 「ヴァルター総監とストラッチス将帥には、レックス・インペリアを歪めようとした罪により、死刑が言い渡されます。他の者たちについては、皇帝陛下の法に従って、あなたの裁きを受けさせねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァルター総監とストラッチス将帥には、レックス・インペリアを歪めようとした罪により、死刑が言い渡されます。他の者たちについては、皇帝陛下の法に従って、あなたの裁きを受けさせねばなりません」

languages.text: "Prefekt Vultur ve Miralay Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'i saptırma teşebbüsü ölümle cezalandırılmalı. Ancak diğerlerini İmparator'un Yasası uyarınca yargılamalısınız."
languages.original_text: "For Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the sentence for attempting to pervert the Lex Imperialis is death. The others must face your judgement in accordance with the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt Vultur ve Miralay Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'i saptırma teşebbüsü ölümle cezalandırılmalı. Ancak diğerlerini İmparator'un Yasası uyarınca yargılamalısınız."
"Prefekt Vultur ve Miralay Strachs'ın Lex İmperialis'i saptırma teşebbüsü ölümle cezalandırılmalı. Ancak diğerlerini İmparator'un kanunu uyarınca yargılamalısınız."
